id: Will White House extradite foe of Turkey’s president after Khashoggi murder?
paragraph: The White House has reportedly considered extraditing a Turkish cleric who is a foe of Turkish president Tayyip Erdogan in the wake of the murder of Turkish journalist Jamal Khashoggi, allegedly by agents of the Saudi Arabian government. Joy Reid and her panel discuss.Nov. 17, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
